sentences.sContent: Air travellers were left stranded because of icy conditions.
sentences.sCn: 飞机乘客因冰冻天气而滞留。

synos.tran: [水运]搁浅的；陷于困境的；有…股的（常用来构成复合词）

words.tran: 使搁浅；使陷于困境；弄断；使落后

trans.tranCn: 搁浅的， 处于困境的
trans.tranOther: a person or vehicle that is stranded is unable to move from the place where they are
